titles.title: Honoring former Congressman Dalip Singh Saund and remembering his achievements as the only Indian American to serve in Congress.
Honoring former Congressman Dalip Singh Saund and remembering his achievements as the only Indian American to serve in Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Honors the life and dedicated service of former Congressman Dalip Singh Saund of California. Remembers his achievements as the first Indian American to serve in Congress.
